mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carcass_input_list( cil_animal_prod_trace_num, cil_purchase_store, cil_purchase_price, cil_weight, cil_num, cil_product, cil_qty, cil_admin, cil_admin_pk, cil_file_path, cil_file_exe, cil_file_ori_name, cil_file_uniq_name, cil_trans_detail_file_path, cil_trans_detail_file_exe, cil_trans_detail_file_ori_name, cil_trans_detail_file_uniq_name, cil_input_date ) VALUES( #{cilAnimalProdTraceNum}, #{cilPurchaseStore}, #{cilPurchasePrice}, #{cilWeight}, #{cilNum}, #{cilProduct}, #{cilQty}, #{cilAdmin}, #{cilAdminPk}, #{cilFilePath}, #{cilFileExe}, #{cilFileOriName}, #{cilFileUniqName}, #{cilTransDetailFilePath}, #{cilTransDetailFileExe}, #{cilTransDetailFileOriName}, #{cilTransDetailFileUniqName}, #{cilInputDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT cil.cil_pk, cil.cil_animal_prod_trace_num, cil.cil_purchase_store, cil.cil_purchase_price, cil.cil_num, cil.cil_weight, cil.cil_product, cil.cil_qty, cil.cil_admin, cil.cil_admin_pk, cil.cil_file_path, cil.cil_file_exe, cil.cil_file_ori_name, cil.cil_file_uniq_name,
cil.cil_trans_detail_file_path, cil.cil_trans_detail_file_exe, cil.cil_trans_detail_file_ori_name, cil.cil_trans_detail_file_uniq_name,
cil.cil_input_date, cil.cil_regdate
FROM carcass_input_list cil
AND cil.cil_input_date >= #{dateStart} AND cil.cil_input_date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND cil.cil_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND cil.cil_purchase_store LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND cil.cil_animal_prod_trace_num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND cil.cil_admin LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND
cil.cil_purchase_price >= #{minNum} AND cil.cil_purchase_price <= #{manNum}
GROUP BY cil.cil_pk, cil.cil_animal_prod_trace_num, cil.cil_purchase_store, cil.cil_purchase_price, cil.cil_num, cil.cil_weight, cil.cil_product, cil.cil_qty, cil.cil_admin, cil.cil_admin_pk, cil.cil_file_path, cil.cil_file_exe, cil.cil_file_ori_name, cil.cil_file_uniq_name,
cil.cil_trans_detail_file_path, cil.cil_trans_detail_file_exe, cil.cil_trans_detail_file_ori_name, cil.cil_trans_detail_file_uniq_name,
cil.cil_input_date, cil.cil_regdate ORDER BY cil.cil_regdate DESC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT cil.cil_pk, cil.cil_animal_prod_trace_num, cil.cil_purchase_store, cil.cil_purchase_price, cil.cil_num, cil.cil_weight, cil.cil_product, cil.cil_qty, cil.cil_input_date,

mapper.update: UPDATE carcass_input_list SET cil_product = #{cilProduct}, cil_purchase_store = #{cilPurchaseStore}, cil_input_date = #{cilInputDate} WHERE cil_pk = #{cilPk}

SELECT CONCAT(cc.cc_code_type, ' ', cd.cd_name) AS cost_detail_name, ci.* FROM cost_io ci INNER JOIN cost_detail cd ON cd.cd_pk = ci.cd_fk INNER JOIN cost_code cc ON cc.cc_pk = cd.cc_fk WHERE cc.cc_carcass_flag = 1
AND ci.ci_regdate >= #{dateStart} AND ci.ci_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND CONCAT(cc.cc_code_type, ' ', cd.cd_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ci.ci_abattoir LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ci.animal_prod_trace_num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ci.ci_items_manuf_num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY ci.ci_regdate DESC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
